extraCurricular.curricularDescription: BVM Innovation and Entrepreneurship Cell BIEC was established under the guidance of Student Startup and Innovation Policy and Ministry of Human Resources Development- Government of India at Birla Vishvakarma Mahavidyalaya. Have worked to establish BIEC as a Pre-Incubation Cell at the college in order to fund startups and innovation projects.

Served as a Chief Editor is the annual magazine of Birla Vishvakarma Mahavidyalaya - "Vishvakarma '17" and was responsible for major changes that the magazine experienced in terms of technology because for the very first time Augmented Reality was introduced which was a great success. The entire team was appreciated by the Chairman of Charutar VidyaMandal Er. Bikhubhai Patel and the head of the Institutes.
Served as a Graphics Head in Birla Vishvakarma Mahavidyalaya and also a part of BVM Central Committee. A major responsibility was to take of all the University activities throughout the year.

Served as a Training and Placement Coordinator at Birla Vishvakarma Mahavidyalaya Engineering College representing the department of Information Technology(IT). The entire team worked really hard for the success of academic placement season and get as many students placed in a maximum number of companies.

extraCurricular.curricularPosition: Chief Organizer, Smart Gujarat for New India Hackathon
